pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inequality Measures for Weighted Data // Computes inequality measures of a given variable taking into account weights. Suitable for ratio, interval and ordered scale. Includes Gini, Theil, Leti index, Palma ratio, 20:20 ratio, Allison and Foster index, Jenkins index, Cowell and Flechaire index, Abul Naga and Yalcin index, Apouey index, Blair and Lacy index. Bootstrap provides distribution of inequality measures enabling significance tests.
